job_details.Vacaturetitel: Big Data Engineer for AI Training
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Outlier helps the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?
       We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.
       About the opportunity:
          + Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
          + This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you
       You may contribute your expertise by…
          + Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
          + Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models
       Examples of desirable expertise
job_details.full_text:
Big Data Engineer for AI Training

Outlier helps the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?
       We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.
       About the opportunity:
          + Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
          + This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you
       You may contribute your expertise by…
          + Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
          + Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models
       Examples of desirable expertise

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on using AI models to improve AI models through human feedback, specifically by crafting questions and evaluating code generated by AI. It does not involve building, training, fine-tuning, or deploying AI models from a technical engineering perspective, nor does it involve core software development tasks related to AI applications. The role is primarily about providing human input to train existing AI models, which aligns with the definition of 'Ambiguous' as a role that primarily focuses on the use of AI tools to enhance productivity or assist in tasks, rather than the development or engineering of AI systems themselves.

job_tasks.justification: The core of the role involves 'train AI models' and 'help train AI large language models', which directly relates to the process of creating or adapting machine learning models.
The description mentions 'engaging with these models as they learn to code', which implies interaction with and contribution to the learning process of AI models.
job_tasks.phrase: engaging with these models as they learn to code

job_tasks.justification: The specific task of 'Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models' is a direct method of providing data and feedback for model training.
job_tasks.phrase: Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models

job_tasks.justification: Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models is a form of model evaluation and fine-tuning, which falls under the modeling category.
job_tasks.phrase: Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models

job_tasks.justification: The role is described as being for an 'experienced software engineer' who will 'lend your coding expertise', suggesting a background in software development, even if the primary task is AI training.
The phrase 'talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models' implies that coding skills are a prerequisite and a part of the contribution.

soft_skills.phrase: no requirement for previous AI experience
